title:u/pandapaxxy's Sundial M+KB breakdown
description:Originally found at https://www.reddit.com/r/sharditkeepit/comments/eazb6x/sundial_weapons_mnk_breakdown/

// Steelfeather Repeater  (PvP / M+KB)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB): "In PvP it will be a bullet hose, quick to down enemies but also pretty underwhelming when it comes to optimal builds. [...] With Swashbuckler and Firmly Planted you’ll have a very easy time killing others, but I don’t think it will shake up the meta unless autos get another buff." Recommended MW - Range.
